name: Review 2
instruction: Match each word with its definition.
instruction_vi: Nối từ với định nghĩa của nó.

answers.definition: to show that a day or an event is important by doing something special
a thing built over a river, road, etc., so that people can cross it
a public festival at which people play music, wear special clothes, and dance in the streets
to like a sports team and go to watch the games they play
the feeling that an event or place gives you
the part of your leg where it joins your foot
to make a sudden very loud noise
the things at the back of a picture
a covering for your head made of hair that is not your hair
to tell somebody about something in a way that makes it easy to understand
12 o'clock at night; the middle of the night
an activity, object or idea that is extremely popular, usually for a short time
to be able to touch something
not real; only in your mind
happy and interested because something good has happened or will happen
to move something to a higher position
